Lyric:
[by:买玫瑰花送女友]
[00:08.37]I remember us alone
[00:10.02]Waiting for the light to go
[00:11.52]Don't you feel that hunger, I've got
[00:13.67]So many secrets to show
[00:15.91]When I saw you on that stage
[00:17.71]I shivered with the look you gave
[00:19.41]Don't you hear that rhythm, can you
[00:21.46]Show me how we can escape
[00:23.76](Ooh oh oh oh, Ooh oh oh oooh)
[00:27.66]I was biting my tongue
[00:29.80]I was trying to hide
[00:31.51](Ooh oh oh oh, Ooh oh oh oooh)
[00:35.40]I'll forget what I've done
[00:37.50]I will be redefined
[00:39.60]It's shaking the sky
[00:41.60]And I'm following lightning
[00:44.50]I'll recover if you keep me alive
[00:47.15]Don't leave me behind
[00:49.39]Can you see me? I'm shining
[00:52.35]And it's you that I've been waiting to find
[00:54.94]I'm holding it all tonight
[00:56.80]Unfolding it all tonight
[00:58.54]You know that you make it shine
[01:00.34]It's you that I've been waiting to find
[01:02.80]I'm holding it all tonight
[01:04.59]Unfolding it all tonight
[01:06.59]You know that you make it shine
[01:08.14]It's you that I've been waiting to find
[02:10.56]Now that we can hear that sound
[02:11.86]Now that you can hold me down
[02:13.45]You can pull me under, you can
[02:15.60]Raise everything to the ground
[02:17.80]Everything I can arrange
[02:19.66]And every part of me you change
[02:21.30]Just hold me together, tell me
[02:23.45]You'll always want me to stay
[02:25.65](Ooh oh oh oh, Ooh oh oh oooh)
[02:29.80]I was biting my tongue
[02:31.69]I was trying to hide
[02:33.51](Ooh oh oh oh, Ooh oh oh oooh)
[02:37.40]I'll forget what I've done
[02:39.45]I will be redefined
[02:41.30]It's shaking the sky
[02:43.50]And I'm following lightning
[02:46.45]I'll recover if you keep me alive
[02:49.30]Don't leave me behind
[02:51.30]Can you see me? I'm shining
[02:54.26]And it's you that I've been waiting to find
[02:57.07]I'm holding it all tonight
[02:58.92]Unfolding it all tonight
[03:00.87]You know that you make it shine
[03:02.46]It's you that I've been waiting to find
[03:04.87]I'm holding it all tonight
[03:06.71]Unfolding it all tonight
[03:08.66]You know that you make it shine
[03:10.27]It's you that I've been waiting to find
[03:49.77]It's you that I've been waiting to find
